Package io.github.annabeths.GameScreens

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.annabeths.GameScreens.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    The main game screen. This is the game itself.
    'Updated:'
    Assessment 2

      • isObjectOverlappingAnyObj

        public boolean isObjectOverlappingAnyObj​(PhysicsObject obj)
        Test if an object is overlapping any existing object in the world. Useful to prevent objects being generated on top of another object
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to test
        Returns:
        true if the object is overlapping with any object in the world, false otherwise

      • logic

        public void logic​(float delta)
        Called once per frame. Updates PhysicsObjects and Obstacles, increments xp.
        Parameters:
        delta - time since the last frame

      • isPlayerInDanger

        public boolean isPlayerInDanger()
        Tests if player is in danger. The player is in danger if it is in range of an EnemyCollege, EnemyBoat, or Kraken.
        Returns:
        true if within range of a danger, false otherwise or player is invincible.

      • isPlayerNearEnemyBoat

        public boolean isPlayerNearEnemyBoat()
        Tests if player is in range of an EnemyBoat.
        Returns:
        true if within range of an enemy boat, false otherwise.

      • isPlayerNearEnemyCollege

        public boolean isPlayerNearEnemyCollege()
        Tests if player is in range of an EnemyCollege.
        Returns:
        true if within range of an enemy college, false otherwise.

      • isPlayerNearKraken

        public boolean isPlayerNearKraken()
        Tests if player is in range of a Kraken.
        Returns:
        true if within range of a kraken, false otherwise.

      • CollegeDestroyed

        public void CollegeDestroyed​(EnemyCollege oldCollege)
        Called when a college is destroyed Makes sure the boss college will be made vulnerable after the rest of the colleges are destroyed, and spawns a friendly college in the place of the enemy college.
        Parameters:
        oldCollege - the college that was destroyed

        public static int getXpRequiredForLevel​(int level)
        The XP required to go from level-1 to level.
        Parameters:
        level - the target level
        Returns:
        the XP difference between previous level and this one

      • getXpRequiredForNextLevel

        public float getXpRequiredForNextLevel()
        The total XP the needs to level up. Note this is NOT the remaining amount, but the total amount to be able to level up.
        Returns:
        the xp required to level up
